question: What was the theme of the 7th World Hindu Economic Forum (WHEF) 2019?
explanation: The 7th edition of World Hindu Economic Forum (WHEF) 2019 was held in Mumbai, Maharashtra. The theme of the event was "Prosperous Society: Stronger Society". It is for the second time the event was held in India. In 2014 it was organized in Delhi (3rd Edition). The 8th edition of 2020 will be organized in The Hague, Netherlands.
